snippet: SolarCity, Elon Musk’s fast-growing provider of rooftop systems, is buying Silevo for at least $200 million in stock and plans a Buffalo factory.
abstract: SolarCity acquires Silevo, maker of high-efficiency solar panels, for at least $200 million in stock; acquisition is intended to move fast-growing provider of rooftop solar electricity systems into panel manufacturing business.
lead_paragraph: SolarCity, Elon Musk’s fast-growing provider of rooftop systems, is buying Silevo for at least $200 million in stock and plans a Buffalo factory.

headline.main: SolarCity Is Acquiring a Start-Up, Silevo, to Build Panels
headline.print_headline: A Maker of Panels Is Acquired by SolarCity
